text: 14.36: Mk 10.38; Zo 6.38; Ro 8.15; Ga 4.6; Hi 5.7Ana ana phorga nzuav, khaŋ ana nzuai, “O, dara, ndu za kha bigi ga mbui ŋkasŋka ki. Ndu na tɨn kha zaagi ndigɨ. Gu ne ndu nzuai, ndu na vuzvuga zɨn ŋgɨ thari. Ndu wo vuzvuga zɨn ŋgɨri.” 14.36 Aram kam, a Zisas nzuai kam ma. Ana ana kam ma, mbe mba kaman ndia mbe kha zitɨr ana mbui, “Abba”. “Abba” mbe khaŋ nzuai, “Dara”.
